name: O2 Die
description:
O2 Die is game realized during the Heart Jam 2018 in 72hours. 

You play a miner who has fallen into the deepest underground of a mine.
There is no more  oxygen, but things are roaming in the dark...
You will need to manage your oxygen because it is consumed by your flamethrower and your light.

This game was created by 2 peoples : Vibromatic (Programmer, Game Designer) & Yoonishan (Graphism, Art Director). It was inspired by Don't Starve  and COD Zombie.
